Type.Name: ByteConverter

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ByteConverter extends System.ComponentModel.BaseNumberConverter

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: This converter can only convert an 8-bit unsigned integer to and from a string.
For more information about type converters, see the base class and How to: Implement a Type Converter.

block.para: You should never create an instance of a . Instead, call the method of . For more information, see the examples in the base class.

summary.para: Provides a type converter to convert 8-bit unsigned integer objects to and from various other representations.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class.
